about_me_text: A Software Developer passioned about simple and efficient solutions for hard problems. Enthusiast of agile methods, flexible environments and Continuous Delivery.
about_me_text_2: For me, minimalism is the key to staying focused on what really matters to users. I always keep attention to details and focus on work ethic.
about_me_text_3: At high school, I had an intense three years of programming classes, including a Final Project made at the end of the third year. Since then, I followed a different paths. I worked with Excel and PowerBI data manipulation, creating P&L's and improving the ones we already had in the company. But I found myself in love with programming once again.

projects_paragraph: I've worked on a number of projects, but these are my main ones. From time to time, I still look at them and check if something need to be renewed or recoded.
